creator: tamirry
title: $:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/project-table
tbl-columns: tbl-expand-one title tags status priority tbl-button
tbl-caption:
__''Realm: ''<$text text=<>/>__
''Tags: ''<$edit-text size="60" placeholder="Enter tags..." tiddler=<> field="tags" class="tbl-hidden-edit"/>
''Description: ''<$edit-text size="60" placeholder="Enter description..." tiddler=<> field="description" class="tbl-hidden-edit"/>
''<$text text=<>/> Projects'' | //<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"><$action-setfield $tiddler="Project" link=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param="Project"/>''new project {{$:/core/images/new-button}}''//
tbl-anything:
<$select tiddler=<<currentRecord>> field="status" default="">
<option value=''>Select...</option>
<option value='open'>open</option>
<option value='not started'>not started</option>
<option value='in-work'>in-work</option>
<option value='on-hold'>on-hold</option>
<option value='complete'>complete</option>
<option value='rework'>rework</option>
<option value='closed'>closed</option>
</$select>
